values: （突然）倒塌；崩溃；失败；瓦解；倒闭；突然失败；折叠；（肺或血管）萎陷；使萎陷；（尤指因病重而）晕倒；垮掉；衰竭；（尤指工作劳累后）躺下放松
（突然的）倒塌；塌陷；垮掉；垮台；失败；突然倒闭；精神崩溃；身体衰弱；（因病或体弱的）昏倒；病倒；（如机构、生意或行动的）突然失败；全面崩溃

sample.mean: v. 流逝；过去
n. 短暂丧失；失误；差错；时间间隔；时间段；丧失；堕落；终止

word_mean_info__list.difference: 一般指由于失去平衡等原因而倒塌，也可作引申用。
通常指房屋等突然倒塌。

word_group.brief_definition: 全部折叠；全部崩溃；纷纷倒闭

bilingual.source: The collapse of the dam caused flooding.
bilingual.target: 水坝的崩溃导致了洪水。

bilingual.source: The building could collapse at any moment.
bilingual.target: 这个建筑物随时可能崩溃。

bilingual.source: The collapse of the dam would cause flooding.
bilingual.target: 大坝的崩溃会导致洪水泛滥。

bilingual.source: The economic crisis led to the collapse of the market.
bilingual.target: 经济危机导致了市场的崩溃。

bilingual.source: His destructive behavior led to the collapse of the project.
bilingual.target: 他的破坏性行为导致了项目的崩溃。

bilingual.source: The economy could collapse under the weight of the national debt.
bilingual.target: 经济可能会在国债的重压下崩溃。

bilingual.source: Some believe that palingenesis can occur after a major societal collapse.
bilingual.target: 有些人认为在重大社会崩溃之后会发生再生。

bilingual.source: The collapse of the subprime mortgage market led to a global recession.
bilingual.target: 次级抵押贷款市场的崩溃导致了全球经济衰退。

bilingual.source: The issue of collapse is being prioritized.
bilingual.target: 崩溃的问题被列为优先事项。

bilingual.source: Let's look directly into the issue of collapse.
bilingual.target: 让我们直接看看崩溃的问题。

list.abstract: Collapse（ [kəˈlæps]），英语单词，作动词用，为倒塌；塌陷；昏倒。作名词用，为倒塌；塌陷；崩溃。短语搭配有total collapse（完全崩溃），例句为“The global collapse is well underway.（全球崩塌正在全面进行中）”。 Collapse不及物动词类近义词有founder、fall in，及物动词类近义词有crumple up，名词类近义词有failure、loss、losing等。Collapse形容词形式为collapsible，名词形式为collapsibility。

yingyinNormal.en: It was at that moment in that dumb restaurant with that stupid look on his face that Mark Baum realized that the whole world economy might collapse.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就在那一刻，在那个失了声的饭馆，马克·鲍姆脸上一副痴呆的表情意识到整个世界的经济要崩溃了。

yingyinNormal.en: No. No. We were happy on my home planet. Going to bed hungry scrounging for scraps. Your planet was on the brink of collapse. I'm the one who stopped that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不。我们在母星上本来很幸福。饿着肚子睡觉到处找残羹冷炙。你的星球当时已濒临崩溃。是我阻止了那发生。

yingyinNormal.en: Six months ago, Maple was on the verge of collapse.
yingyinNormal.zh: 六个月前枫树镇濒临破产。

yingyinNormal.en: Say colony collapse disorder keeps on happening, and all the bees get wiped out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 蜂群崩坏症候群不断的发生，然后所有的蜜蜂都死了。

yingyinNormal.en: You think the grief will make you smaller inside, like your heart will collapse in on itself, but it doesn't.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你以为悲痛会让你的内心更弱小，好像你的心彻底瓦解了，但其实并不会。

yingyinNormal.en: It was David Hackenberg who first alerted the world to a phenomenon called colony collapse disorder. Are they dead?
yingyinNormal.zh: 大卫·哈肯伯格首先提醒世界一种现象，叫做蜂群崩坏症候群。他们死了吗?

yingyinNormal.en: We do not know exactly what this signifies but the result appears to be a total collapse of the enemy's capacity to fight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们虽然还没有查明原因到底是什么，但是结果却表明我们的敌人已经完全丧失了战斗能力。

yingyinNormal.en: A lot of people agree with David's theory. But the scientific jury's still out on exactly what's causing colony collapse disorder.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很多人同意大卫的理论。但科学家仍然在努力研究到底是什么造成了蜂群崩坏症候群。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 失败; 倒闭; 崩溃

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: (of an institution or undertaking) fail suddenly and completely
sense_info_list.zh: 失败; 倒闭; 崩溃

examination_example.sentence: Legislators are getting frightened about a politically embarrassing short-term <highlight>collapse</highlight> at the USPS.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 立法者对美国邮政系统的政治尴尬的短期崩溃感到害怕。

examination_example.sentence: Integrity had <highlight>collapsed</highlight>, because of a collective acceptance that the only "sorting mechanism" in society should be profit and the market.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 诚信已经崩溃，因为人们普遍认为，社会上唯一的“分类机制”应该是利润和市场。

examination_example.sentence: The resulting settlement maps show how the distribution and density of the rural population around the city changed dramatically, when Copán <highlight>collapsed</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由此产生的定居地图显示了城市周围农村人口的分布和密度是如何发生巨大变化的，当时Copán崩溃了。

sense_info_list.en: (of a structure) fall down; give way

examination_example.sentence: A string of accidents, including the partial <highlight>collapse</highlight> of a cooling tower in 2007, raised serious questions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一连串的事故，包括2007年一座冷却塔的部分倒塌，引发了严重的问题。

sense_info_list.en: (of a person) fall down and become unconscious, typically through illness or injury
fold or be foldable into a small space
(of a price or currency)drop suddenly in value
to sit or lie down and relax, especially after working hard

word_usage.usage: collapse作动词时，常用作不及物动词。
collapse作名词时，常用作单数形式或不可数名词，如：the collapse of share prices 股价暴跌。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: (of a structure) fall down; give way

examination_example.sentence: If the wooden frame of the towers had caught fire, it could have sent the bells crashing down, potentially causing the <highlight>collapse</highlight> of both towers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果双塔的木质框架着火，可能会导致钟倾倒，潜在地导致双塔倒塌。

examination_example.sentence: Once again people began to argue whether Notre Dame Cathedral was going to <highlight>collapse</highlight> even without the fire.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们再次开始争论，即使没有火灾，巴黎圣母院是否会倒塌。

examination_example.sentence: The cathedral has been at a years-long dispute over who should finance restoration work of the <highlight>collapsing</highlight> staircases, crumbling statues and cracked walls.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 多年来，这座教堂一直处于争论之中，争论的焦点是谁应该为坍塌的楼梯、破碎的雕像和破裂的墙壁的修复工作提供资金。

sense_info_list.en: (of an institution or undertaking) fail suddenly and completely
fall down suddenly because of pressure or having no strength or support

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: (of an institution or undertaking) fail suddenly and completely

examination_example.sentence: Now a third and far more significant motivation presents itself: meeting these goals may be necessary to prevent the <highlight>collapse</highlight> of our civilization.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在出现了第三个更重要的动机：实现这些目标可能是避免我们文明崩溃的必要条件。

examination_example.sentence: Our continuing failure to deal with the environmental declines forces me to conclude that such a <highlight>collapse</highlight> is possible.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们在应对环境衰退方面的持续失败迫使我得出结论，即这种崩溃是可能的。

examination_example.sentence: The author has come to agree that food shortages could ultimately lead to the <highlight>collapse</highlight> of world civilization.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作者认同食物短缺最终会导致世界文明的崩溃。

sense_info_list.en: (of a structure) fall down; give way
(of a person) fall down and become unconscious; typically through illness or injury

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The international scholars' warning letter doesn't say exactly what <highlight>collapse</highlight> will look like or when it might happen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 国际学者的警告信并没有确切说明崩盘会是什么样子或何时发生。

examination_example.sentence: A survey of scientists found that extreme weather events, food insecurity, and freshwater shortages might create global <highlight>collapse</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一项对科学家的调查发现，极端天气事件、粮食不安全和淡水短缺可能会造成全球崩溃。

examination_example.sentence: As for the public awareness of global <highlight>collapse</highlight>, the author is worried.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 至于公众对全球崩溃的认识，作者很担心。

examination_example.sentence: One afternoon, while attempting to get into bed she <highlight>collapsed</highlight> (倒下) from what was eventually discovered to be a heart attack.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一天下午，当她试图上床时，因最终发现是心脏病发作而倒下。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>collapse</highlight> of any of the networks of relations our well-being(健康) depends upon, such as food and energy, would produce terrible results.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的健康所依赖的任何关系网络，如食物和能源，一旦崩溃，都将产生可怕的后果。

examination_example.sentence: The word “<highlight>collapse</highlight>” in Paragraph 5 probably means “a sudden failure”.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第5段中的“崩溃”一词可能指“突然的失败”。

sense_info_list.zh: 崩溃; 瓦解; 失败

examination_example.sentence: But then I just started to <highlight>collapse</highlight>（崩溃）.
